thread.title: Gardai seize vehicle after it overtook unmarked garda car at 100kmph
thread.title_full: Gardai seize vehicle after it overtook unmarked garda car at 100kmph

title: Gardai seize vehicle after it overtook unmarked garda car at 100kmph
text:
Gardai seize vehicle after it overtook unmarked garda car at 100kmph Independent.ie Gardai seized a vehicle after it overtook an unmarked garda car at a speed of 100kmph. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/gardai-seize-vehicle-after-it-overtook-unmarked-garda-car-at-100kmph-35334304.html http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/article35334303.ece/24d33/AUTOCROP/h342/cargv.jpg The seized vehicle. Photo: Twitter Gardai seized a vehicle after it overtook an unmarked garda car at a speed of 100kmph. Share Gardai seize vehicle after it overtook unmarked garda car at 100kmph Independent.ie Gardai seized a vehicle after it overtook an unmarked garda car at a speed of 100kmph. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/gardai-seize-vehicle-after-it-overtook-unmarked-garda-car-at-100kmph-35334304.html 
The vehicle has no NCT and the front tyres were bald, according to gardai. Garda Traffic: Gardaí seize vehicle with no NCT since 2015, front tyresbald, overtaking marked Garda car in excess of 100kph pic.twitter.com/RltKuS0JPX — An Garda Síochána (@GardaTraffic) January 1, 2017 
Over the festive period gardai were warning drivers to be careful on the roads. 
This comes at the total death toll for 2016 reached 188 after a year of carnage. 
According to the Road Safety Authority, that is an increase of 26 people on 2015.
